text:
Rhymes

The following screen displays a word, as part of a question, for 2 seconds. You will then have a short pause before being presented with a new word. You then have 4 seconds to answer whether the second word rhymed with the first.

When you are ready, press start.
Does the following word rhyme with

Thank you for completing the previous task.

You will now watch a video, lasting a couple of minutes. The video has sound. Please make sure you volume is low enough not to disturb those around you. You may mute your speakers if you wish.

When you are ready to begin watching, press play.

Recall

The following task requires you to recall as many of the words from the previous 'Rhyming' task as you can. Each word will be displayed in turn along with 'Yes/No' response buttons. Simply indicate whether you recognise the word or not.

When you are ready, press start.

Thank you for completing the study

We're collecting data across all three seminars and you'll get to see the results next week.

When you are ready to leave, press finish.

You may now close your browser

Please ignore any messages about leaving without saving your data.
